title: PhotoStage Photo and Video Slideshow Maker Free [PC Download]
description: PhotoStage is a fun and user-friendly photo slideshow creator tool. You can do it all with this presentation maker, where you can add thousands of photos and video clips. When you have organized your files, easily add captions, music, and narration. This slideshow maker is filled with effects to make your slideshow come alive. Preview all of these effects in real time. When finished, burn your video to a disc, upload online, save to your phone, and more.
